1.description: Destroy target prop. Summon an allied Common Slime in its place.
Inflict Hex 1 on units with current HP at 2 or less in an area.
Summon a Bomb Beetle. It hits close units for 1 dmg when is Killed.
Summon a Fish Bait. When it spawns it inflict Lure 3 on targeted enemy.
Jump to target position and summon a Trick Effigy at previous position.
Fire a shot that applies a Dispel in an area.
Two target unit swap their positions.
A target combat unit inflict Lure 1 to the target mob.
Destroy a target mob that has 1 current HP. Copy a Premonition.
Draw 1 then place target card library at the top of the library.
Double the value of all current Effect currently applied on target.
Discard target card. Draw a card of equal Archetype and of the next rune level of discarded card (5 loop back to 1).
Copy target card.

2.description: If target mob is suffering Hex or Sleep purge and apply Charm 5 on target. Else apply Charm 1 on target.
Fire a shot that inflict Hex 3.
Target combat unit Heal 1 plus Heal 1 for each nearby ally.
Return target info to its value on the previous turn.
Purge self. Discard up to 3 selected cards and shuffle library after each card is discarded.
Fire a shot that inflict Charm 2.
Place a puppet glyph on target position. It inflict Charm 4 to an enemy that move to its position.
Summon weak clone of the target mob as an enemy of that target.
Swap all HP info of two target units.
Summon a Blazing Sage. It inflict Burn 1 on enemies.
Copy all library cards already cast in the current turn.
Destroy combat target unit and summon two clones of it with half of its HP info.
Place two Reflectors and copy a Mimicry. It redirect shots and dashes that passes throught it.
Summon a Leaf Sage. It bestow Flight and heal allies.
Summon 2 Slime Remnant next to target allies. -> Discard <- Summon 2 Slime Remnant.
Place a pair of Portals. Units and shots that move through one will reappear from the other.

3.description: Summon an Animated Executionner. It pursues and attacks nearby enemies.
Either destroy an ally or discard phantom cards and Heal based on sacrifice. -> Discard <- Copy a Polymorph
If target is suffering Sleep , heal 2 and copy a Premonition. Else inflcit Sleep to target.
Place a Steps Ahead Glyph. It inflicts Hex 1 and Copy a Premonition when sprung. Glyph strength increases every turn.
Teleport to target position gain Stealth 1 and summon a Ghastly Stalker. It fire shots at enemies.
Place 4 Sleep Glyph around target ally. They inflict Sleep on enemies that move to its position.
Destroy target mob suffering from a negative effect.
Displace a target unit to its position in the previous turn .
Fire a phaser that inflict Sleep .
Bestow Flight to all units in an area.
Summon a Hypno Cube. It inflict Lure 1 to nearby enemies and it inflict Sleep in an area around itself when it dies.
Displace target unit to targete position.
Discard selected card and copy 2 that same card.

4.description: Summon a Slow Hexing Bomb. It explode inflicting Hex 1 and 1 dmg in an area.
Purge and dispel all units.
Apply Charm 5 on target mob.
Inflict Hex 1 in an area. Unit suffering Hex are destroyed instead and Frog Statues are summoned in their position.
Flush hand, Copy target card for each discarded card.
Summon a Magic Cauldron. It bestow many beneficials Effects on its turn.
Summon a Mirror Orb. It inflict Lure 1 to nearby enemies and it hit for 1 dmg aound itself when attacked.
Return a unit to its state at the start of the previous turn.
Displace all unit in an area to target position. Bestow Immune 1 to summoned units.
Teleport to target position then inflict Sleep to all close units.
Summon a Flawed Clone. It pursue and attacks nearby enemies.
Apply Charm 5 to close enemies -> Discard <- Copy a Puppeteer

5.description: Summon a Slime King. The king is just a slime with lot of health.
Target mob execute its turn immediately.
Summon an Angelic Champion. It damages enemies and heal its allies.
Destroy target combat unit.
Summon The Manalith. It gradually gain Max HP and it inflict Stun based on its max HP when it dies.
Copy 5 Premonition.
Summon an allied weak clone of all enemies. Suffer Sleep .

1.description: Fire a shot that inflicts 2 dmg.
Inflict 1 dmg to close units. -> Kill <- Copy up to one Flame Ring.
Attack a target 2 times. -> Kill <- Recast!
Fire a shot that inflicts Wound 2.
Attack units in a line.
Inflict 1 dmg and Burn 2 in a short line,
Inflict 1 dmg a grounded target combat unit or 3 dmg to a flying target combat unit.
Attack target combat unit and inflict Wound 1 for each point of damage inflicted.
Suffer 2 dmg. Copy the 2 Raider cards at the bottom of the library. Devotion canno copy itself
Inflict 6 dmg to target combat unit and suffer 2 dmg.
Discard up to 3 cards and inflict 1 dmg plus 1 dmg for each discarded card card to target combat unit.
Inflict 1 dmg to all units in an area. -> Polykill <- Recast .
Attack a target 3 times. -> Grit <- Attack a target 5 times instead.

2.description: Push (inf) target unit inflicting 2 dmg to it and anything it collides with.
Inflict 3 dmg to target combat unit. -> Kill <- Teleport to target position.
Fire a shot that inflicts 4 dmg. It vanishes after travelling 3 tiles.
Fire a shot that inflict 2 dmg, Disease 2 and place Ice floor as it travels.
Fire a Shot that Pull 1 target unit and inflict 1 dmg if target is grounded or 3 dmg if target is flying.
Inflict 2 dmg to all units in an area. -> Grit <- Inflict 5 dmg instead.
Inflict Burn 5 to target mob. Suffer Burn 1.
Inflict Wound 3 to all units in an area.
Either inflict 3 dmg to target unit or inflict 1 dmg to all units in an area.
Attack target combat unit and fire a phaser that inflicts Burn 1 for each point of damage inflicted.
If target mob is not suffering Burn inflict Burn 3. Else remove Burn from target and units in an area are hit for dmg based on Burn .
Suffer and inflict 1 dmg to target unit for each Raider card in hand. -> Grit <- Double the damage inflicted.
Flush hand and inflict dmg to target based on discard amount. -> Discard <- Copy 2 Sparks.
Inflict Lure 1 to enemies in the area and gain Retaliate 1 for each enemy lured.
Dash a distance of 3 tiles. Inflict 3 dmg to anything collided with and suffer 1 dmg. -> Kill <- Recast .
Inflict 1 dmg to all enemies with 1 curr HP. -> Grit <- Inflict caster's curr HP dmg to all enemies with same HP or less.

3.description: Fire a Shot that inflicts 4 dmg and also fires two perpendicular shots that hit for 2 dmg each.
Dash placing Electric Fields behind and inflicting 2 dmg to anything collided with.
Inflict Burn 1 to all close units for each unit in the area. Gain Retaliate 1 for each unit in the area.
Jump and attack combat unit target with a +5 dmg bonus if target has more curr HP than caster.
Attack and inflict Wound 3 to all units in a small area.
Jump to target position. Inflict Burn 2 to close mobs before jump and 2 dmg to close units upon landing.
Inflict 3 dmg to grounded units or 1 dmg to flying units in an area.
Jump to target enemy and attack it. -> Initiative <- Gain Retaliate 1 and Lure 1 close units.
Attack target combat unit with a +4 dmg bonus. If target has Shield or is Immune, dispel those Effects .
Fire a Shot that inflicts 2 dmg plus Wound 1 and then Pull (inf) back any unit hit towards caster.
Fire a Shot that inflicts 2 dmg. -> Kill <- Close units are hit for 2 dmg.
Fire 3 parallel or cardinal shots that inflicts 2 dmg each.
Fire a phaser that inflicts 1 dmg to grounded units and 5 dmg to flying units.

4.description: Inflict 2 dmg to a target combat unit. -> Kill <- Teleport to target position and Recast !
Inflict 2 dmg to target combat unit. -> Kill <- Inflict 2 dmg to all close units and place a Magma at target position.
Inflict 4 dmg to target unit. If target is a prop it explodes, inflicting 4 dmg to all close units.
Fire a Shot that inflicts 10 dmg.
Inflict 3 instances of 1 dmg and then 1 instance of 3 dmg to target combat units.
Dash to direction. Units around the dash are hit for 1 dmg if grounded or 3 dmg if flying. -> Polykill <- Recast .
Inflict 4 dmg to all units in a cross area.
Grab a combat unit and jump with it to target position inflicting 3 dmg to it and 1 dmg to units around the landing tile.
Inflict 1 dmg to grounded units or 4 dmg to flying units in a larget area. -> Kill <- Place a Gust Field.
Fall to a central position, suffer 3 dmg and inflict 3 dmg and Burn 1 to all units. -> Grit <- Inflict 5 dmg and Burn 2 instead.
Inflict damage to all units in an area based on the number of units in the area.
Inflict 1 dmg and Stun 1 to close grounded units or 4 dmg and Stun 2 to close flying units

5.description: Inflict 10 dmg to all close units. Suffer 3 dmg.
Pull 2 all units. Inflict 1 dmg to grounded or 4 dmg to flying units around caster. -> Polykill <- Recast .
Inflict 4 dmg on any unit standing in target position and all units around are hit for 1 dmg. Place Magma in the affected area.
Inflict 6 dmg divided among units in an area. -> Polykill <- Recast !
Fire a Shot that inflicts 5 dmg, Burn 5 and places Magma as it travels.
Attack all enemies. -> Grit <- Attack all enemies 4 more times.
Fire a phaser that inflicts 10 dmg. -> Kill <- Copy a Triple Spark.

1.description: Attack target combat unit with a +10 dmg if target current HP is 2 or less
A random combat unit (caster included) is hit for 2 dmg -> Kill <- Recast and increase dmg by 1
Fire a shot that inflicts Poison 7
All combat units (caster included) are hit for 21 dmg divided among them
Summon a Spiderling They spawn suffering a random Effect and inflict an Effect upon death
Inflict 3 dmg and bestow Regen 5 to target mob or self
Exhume 1 at random. -> Discard <- Exhume 1 at random.
Send target unit to another random room in the same dungeon floor
Draw all instances of selected card and Exhume all instances of selected card Seek cannot target itself
Inflict Petrify on all units (caster included) with less current HP than the amount of Stranger runes equipped
Draw 5 then Discard 5 cards Different effects occur based on the Archetypes of discarded cards
Exhume target card if able then Discard it Recast

2.description: Zip to target position inflicting a random effect on zipped units
Discard an Effect card Fire a shot that inflicts the discarded Effect 5
Fire a shot that inflicts 1 dmg then Jump 2 tiles away -> Initiative <- Copy Infinite Kunai -> Precision <- Copy Infinite Kunai
Fire a shot that swaps caster and unit hit positions and also inflicts 2 dmg to that unit
Dash inflicting 2 dmg and Push 2 to anything collided with Inflict Stun 1-2 if pushed unit hits an obstacle
Discard target phantom card Fire a shot that inflicts 1-2 dmg -> Precision <- Copy a Mimicry
Jump to target position and place Web close to starting position and at the landing position
Place a Ancient Glyph at target position It applies Petrify to an enemy that moves to its position
Fire shot that inflicts 1 dmg and Root 1. If unit is already suffering Root apply Petrify instead
Bestow Immunity 1 and inflict Poison 5 to target mob or self
Inflict 1 dmg in an area for each Oracle card in hand Copy a Oracle card from library for each Raider card in hand
Draw 1 for each Warden card in hand Heal 1 for each Traveler card in hand
Attack target with a +1 dmg bonus for each Warden card in hand Push 1 target for each Raider card in hand
Zip across a distance base on Raider card in hand Inflict 1 dmg to zipped units for each Traveler card in hant
Summon Bomb Beetles away from caster for each Traveler card in hand Gain Stealth 1 for each Oracle card in hand
Copy Premonitions for each Warden card in hand Gain Shield 1 one direction at time for each Oracle card in hand

3.description: Summon 3 Helpless Frogs On spawn they inflict Poison 3 and Disease 3 in an area around them
Target unit is hit for 1-6 dmg at Random If target survives caster is hit for 1-6 dmg at Random
Exhume 1 from the bottom -> Patience <- Exhume 1 from the bottom for each AP
Inflict 10 dmg and Burn 1 to units in Stealth in the area and bewstow Stealth 1 to visible units in the area
Fire a phaser that inflicts 1 dmg and Burn 2 -> Polyhit <- Heal 2
Fire a shot that inflicts Poison 2, places Webs as it travels and spawns a Spiderling at impact point
If target mob or self is suffering Poison , remove Poison and Heal it based on Poison value Else inflict Poison 5 on target
Dash to direction Summoning Barricade Walls behind and inflict 3 dmg to any unit collided with
Either Jump to a cardinal target position or inflict 4 dmg to close enemy in the diagonal -> Kill <- Jump to target
Bestow Imunnity 1 and inflict Stun 1 to every mob
Inflict up to 10 instances of 1 dmg to target combt unit for every 250 shards collected. Lose 250 shards every attack
Copy a random card
Heal 2 all units in an area then fire a shot that inflicts damage based on healing done

4.description: Summon 4 Blast Stones Each stone's mood generates a different effect when they are hit
Either Jump to target position or inflict 4 dmg to target enemy -> Kill <- Jump to target position and Recast
Teleport to target position Heal 2 to self and inflict 2 dmg to all close units
Inflict 3 dmg to all enemies in an diagonal range -> Polykill <- Teleport to furthest Killed unit position and Recast
Displace target unit to target position, placing an Alpha Star mark at target's original location
Fire a Shot that inflicts 4 dmg then it spawns a pair of Volcanic Slime Remnants
Zip to target position, inflict 1 dmg to zipped units. Gain Shield 1 -> Initiative <- Recast
Inflict 1 dmg, Wound 3 and place Ice Floor in an area -> Patience <- +2 dmg bonus for each AP
Build a Black Checker and a White Checker One Exhume 1 and the other bestows 1 AP after being hit
Swap the values of caster's current HP with caster's current AP
Summon an Orlok Heart It inflicts 1 dmg in an area gaining max HP. It then explodes inflicting damage based on its max HP
Suffer half of caster's current HP damage and Summon a Shadow Warrior It pursues and attacks nearby enemies

5.description: Inflict Hex 1, Poison 5, and Disease 5 to mobs in area
Summon The King It bestows Immune 1 to its summoner, but it Kills its summoner if it dies while in combat
Teleport to target position and inflict 3 dmg to enemies in a massive area
Summon a Gravestone It summons Grave Zombies based on amount of cards in graveyard
Destroy target unit and spawn a Black Hole in its place It Crushes units around it at the end of the round
Inflict 1 dmg to all units (caster excluded) for each point of damage inflicted by caster this turn
Recreate the disharmony of the Archetypes from time of the formless world

1.description: Discard up to 2 target library cards abd gain 1 API for each card discarded.
Discard target library card and Draw 1. -> Discard <- Draw 1.
Gain Stealth 1. -> Discard <- Draw 1
Jump at target obstacle then Jump to target position.
Inflict 1 dmg in a small cross area. -> Polyhit <- Draw 1.
Fire a shot that inflict 1 dmg. Jump 2 tiles backwards.
Teleport behind target then attack it. -> Initiative <- Recast !
Fire a shot that pulls the caster to the impact point. THen attack any unit at the impact point.
Jump to target position then Jump for a second target position.
Teleport to target position.
Galin Flight .
Fire a shot that inflicts 1 dmg. -> Initiative <- Draw 1. -> Discard <- Gain 1 AP.

2.description: Fire a shot that 1 dmg for each tile traveled. -> Precision <- Draw 1.
Jump to a close target tile or any tile in range with lot. If collected an loot, Draw 1.
Discard up to 1 card and gain AP. Jump to target position.
Jump to target position and inflict 3 dm to any unit exactly midway between start and finish. -> Precision <- Recast !
Attack target unit then Dash 2 tiles backwards. -> Initiative <- Dash 4 tiles backwards instead.
Inflict 1 dmg in a 3 tile line with a +2 dmg bonus in the last tile. -> Precision <- Draw 1.
Discard target library card. Fire a shot that inflict 1 dmg with a +2 dmg bonus if a Traveler card was discarded.
Fire a shot that inflicts 1 dmg with a +9 dmg bonus if the shot travels exactly 4 tiles.
Dash in a direction and attack a unit at the end with a +6 dmg bonus if there are exactly 7 library cards in hand.
Place Gamma Star Marks at 3 target tiles that will be hit for 2 dmg at the end of the round. -> Precision <- Draw 2.
Fire a phaser that inflict 2 dmg. -> Polyhit <- Draw 2.
Jump to target position. -> Patience <- Heal 1 for each AP.
A phaser that inflicts 1 dmg. -> Polyhit <- Teleport to phaser's final position.
Fire a shot that inflicts 1 dmg with a +5 dmg bonus if its the only car in hand. -> Initiative <- Draw 1 for each point of damage.
Place Beta Start Marks at 2 target tiles that will be hit for 3 dmg at the end of the round. -> Precision <- Draw 3.
Fire a shot that inflict 1 dmg. Teleport to target position. -> Initiative <- Draw 1 prioritizing another Shuriken, gain 1 AP.
Heal 1 and Draw 1 -> Grit <- Heal 2 and Draw 2, insead Recast

3.description: Place a Killing Arrow Mark at target tile. It will be hit for 10 dmg at the end of the round.
Fire a phaser that inflict 1 dmg with +1 dmg bonus for each unit it phases. -> Precision <- Draw 2.
Gain Stealth 1. If there are no enemies nearby, gain Stealth 3 instead.
Jump to target tile then inflict 2 dmg in an area. -> Polyhit <- Recast
Zip to target position, inflicting 1 dmg to zipped units. -> Initiative <- Recast !
Caster will be displaced to target position at the end of their turn.
Fire a shot that inflict 3 dmg and then inflict 1 dmg to target unit. -> Precision <- Draw 1.
Zip towards a direction stopping only at wall and inflicting 2 dmg to zipped units.
Gain Stealth 2 and Flight . -> Discard <- Gain 1 AP.
Jump on target enemy and inflict 1 dmg for each AP. -> Precision <- Recast !
Teleport to target position and attack target unit. -> Patience <- +2 dmg bonus for each AP.
Place an Alpha Star Mark at target tile. It will be hit for 7 dmg at the end of the round. -> Precision <- Draw 7.
Reshuffle hand ans library card. Draw 1 for each cards previously in hand -1. -> Discard <- Gain 1AP.

4.description: Inflict 4 dmg in a scattered area. -> Polyhit <- Inflict 4 dmg in a scattered area again.
Inflict 1 dmg in a large area with a +3 dm bonus at tpecific tiles.
Inflict 3 dmg in a scattered area. -> Polyhit <- Gain Stealth 3.
Attack target combat unit and gain 1 AP.
Fire 4 cardinal shots that inflict 1 dmg. -> Polyhit <- Gain 1 AP. -> Initiative <- Gain 1 AP.
Zip to target position, inflicting 1 dmg to zipped units. -> Initiative <- Recast and increase dmg by 1.
Inflict 3 dmg to any unit at target position and 1 dmg in a small area. -> Polyhit <- Recast !
If not in Flight , Zip to target inflicting 1 dmg and gain Flight . Else jump to target position and inflict 10 dmg to target unit. Dispel Flight .
Fire a shot that inflict 4 dmg and then bounces to a nearby enemy decreasing damage by 1. -> Polyhit <- Draw 2.
Teleport to target position and attack target unit twice. -> Initiative <- If at 1 AP Recast !
Fire a shot that inflicts 1 dmg and the pulls caster. -> Initiative <- Recast ! -> Precision <- Recast !
Teleport to target position and then Zip back attacking zipped units

5.description: Draw a Hook and Shuriken from library. If all or none of the card were drawn gain 1 AP.
Draw 3. -> Discard <- Draw 2.
If in Stealth attack target combat unit with a +9 dmg bonus. Else attack target combat unit then gain Stealth 1.
Gain 2 AP. -> Discard <- Draw 2.
Inflict 4 dmg in a large scattered area. -> Polyhit <- Recast !
Jum to target position and then Zip to another position inflicting 2 dmg to zipped units. -> Precision <- Recast !
Teleport to target position. Gain 1 AP.

1.description: Summon a Barricade Wall. It blocks shots and movements
Heal 1 plus Heal 1 for each close enemy.
Gain Shield 1 opposite to target direction. If there was a unit at target: Push 1. -> Patience <- : Gain Shield 1 perpendicularly.
Push 1 target towards any direction. If target is a gizmo inflict 1 dmg to target.
Place a Stun Trap at target position. It inflicts Stun 2 to an enemy that moves to its position.
Build a Buzzsaw. It inflict 1 dmg to close units when hit.
Build a Crossbow. It fire a shot that inflicts 1 dmg when hit.
Summon a pair of Crystal Gems. They are resilient and move when attacked and may hit units they collide with.
Gain Shield 2 toward the target direction. Inflict Root to units in a line with value based on distance.
Bestow Regen 3 and Retaliate 1 to target mob or self.
Attack target unit and launch it the furthest distance possible in the same direction.
Push 1 all units toward target direction.
Place Caltrops in the area. They inflict 1 dmg and Wound 1 to grounded units that moves to its posiiton.
Summon 4 Health Fruits. They Heal 1 when destroyed.

2.description: If caster has a Shield , dispel it and inflict dmg and Stun based on the shield value. Else fain Shield 1 and inflict 1 dmg to a unit.
Bestow Regen 2 and inflict Root 2 to target mob or self.
Heal 2 all allies in an area.
Place web tiles in a lines. They provide free pathing to allies and inflict Root 1 to grounded enemies.
Build a Catapult. It launches nearby units when hit.
Build a Tesla Claw. It inflict 2 dmg to the closest enemy of its summoner when hit.
Build a pair of Plasma Pylons. They inflict 2 dmg to units between them when hit.
Place a Vinethorns trap. It inflict 1 dmg and Root 1 to any grounded unit that steapd on it. It multiplies at the end of the round.
Purge self. -> Discard <- Heal 2.
Attack and inflict Root 2 to target unit. -> Patience <- Attack and inflict Stun 1 to target instead.
Summon a Ooze Mixer gizmo. It summons a Slime Remnant next to it when hit.
Inflict 2 dmg and Root 1 to all close units and summon Barricade Walls around the area.
Inflict 1 dmg and Push 1 to close units. Inflict Stun 1 to units that cannot move.
Throw target unit to target position, inflicting 1 dmg and Stun 1. Inflict Stun 1 to all unit clase to target position.
Summon a copy of target prop or gizmo.

3.description: Place 2 lines of Webs. Provide free pathing to allies and inflict Root 1 to grounded enemies that moves over it.
Inflict 1 dmg and Root 1 in an area. Place Ice Floor in the same area.
Destroy target prop or gizmo. If target was a gizmo it explodes and units in a small area are hit for 2 dmg and suffer Stun 1.
Attack and Push 4 to target combat unit. Infilict Stun 1-4 if unit hit a obstacle.
Build a Thermostat. It inflicts Wound 1 and place Ice Floors in an area when hit.
Build a Tran Dynamo. It Push 1 all units to the target direction when hit.
Heal 3 target unit and inflict 2 dmg to all units around it.
Place Onsens in an area. They Heal 1 grounded units that moves to its position.
Summon a Stalactite. Any unit under it as it spawns are hit for 2 dmg and suffer Crush .
Summon a Stalagmite. Any unit over it as it spawns are hit for 1 dmg, suffer Stun 1 and Crush .
Place 4 Glyphs of Repel in cardinals. They inflict Stun 1 to an enemy that moves to its postion then repel the unit over it at the end of the turn.
Gain Retaliate 1. -> Patience <- Gain Immunity 1 and Retaliate 1 for each AP instead.
Build a Bonfire. It Heal 1 nearby allies and inflicts Burn 1 nearby enemies when hit.

4.description: Destroy all props and clear all placed Traps.
Inflict Root 1 and Disease 5 to all mobs. Mobs already suffering Root are hit for 2 dmg.
Heal target equal to its max HP.
Place Glyphs of Repel in a line. They inflict Stun 1 to an enemy that moved to its position then Push the unit over it.
Summon a Frozen Meteor. Place Ice Fllors around it. Any unit under it as it spawns are hit for 2 dmg and suffer Crush .
Purge self. Inflict Push 1 to all close units and then inflict Root 2 on all units in a wider area.
Summon a Chaining Rock. it inflict Root 1 to any unit in target position.
Inflict Root 2 to all grounded mobs in an area and Heal 1 for each mob rooted.
Inflict Stun 1 to close units. Place Stalactite Warning at target tiles. They will be hit for 2 dmg at the end of the round.
Build a pair of Magma Pylons. They place Magma between them when hit.
Inflict Stun 1 to all mobs in the area.
Gain Immunity 2

5.description: Gain Shield 3 on all direction and summon Barricade Wall in the corners around caster.
Bestow Regen 3 and Heal 4 to target combat unit.
Place Magma in a wide are then Push 1 all close units.
Build a Piledriver. It summons Stalagmite under the closest enemy when hit.
3 phasers that clear all place tile traps and inflicts Push 1, 2 dmg and Stun 1 to units.
Inflict Stun 1 and summon Ice Slabs around target mob. The blocks inflict Crush to units around target.
Purge self and gain Immunity 2.
